name: Очищающая пенка Garnier Skin Naturals гиалуроновая 150мл
ingredients: aqua/water, sorbitol, lauric acid, stearic acid, myristic acid, potassium hydroxide, glycol distearate, palmitic acid, kaolin, sodium cocoamphoacetate, coco-betaine, parfum / fragrance, aloe barbadensis leaf juice powder, sodium chloride, sodium hyaluronate, ascorbyl glucoside, disodium edta, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, polyquaternium-7, sodium benzoate, phenoxyethanol
